name: CRAFTSMAN V20 Cordless Reciprocating Saw, 2,800 SPM, Bare Tool Only (CMCS340B)
short_description: Variable speed Trigger For Added Control
Compact And Lightweight: Only 12.75-in front to back and weighs 3.2lbs
Tool-Free Blade Release For Fast and Convenient Blade Change
Pivoting Shoe for Control
product_description: This lightweight, compact reciprocating saw is only 3.2 lbs and can be used one-handed. It has a 3/4" stroke length and provides up to 2,800 SPM which makes this tool perfect for quick cuts in tight spaces. The pivoting shoe and variable speed trigger provide added control for a variety of jobs. This tool is ideal for pruning small tree limbs and branches.

name: GALAX PRO 120V Reciprocating Saw, 6.0 Amp Variable Speed Corded Reciprocating Saw with 4/5" Stroke Length, 0-3000SPM and 4-1/2" Max for Wood, Metal, PVC Pipe Cutting
short_description: Higher cutting efficiency: This reciprocating saw is fitted with a powerful 6.0A motor, to deliver up to 3000SPM for precise cutting in a wide variety of materials. Such as ideal for cutting a lot of logs and wood for your wood burner, sheet, pallets, PVC pipe, plastic, cast iron pipe etc

Stroke length and cutting capacity: This reciprocating saw has 4/5" Stroke Length, maximum cutting depth in wood and metal is 4-1/2". This saw’s cutting speed can be locked by using the lock-on button, you no need to press the trigger switch all the time

Quick change chuck and shoe adjustable: Quick-change chuck allows for easy tool-less blade changing, so you can get straight on with the task in hand without additional tools. Pivoting shoe easily maneuvers(±15 °) around objects while cutting. Adjustable front shoe allows you to use the entire blade, increasing blade life

Variable speed and ergonomic design: This electric saw comes with large trigger switch with variable speed control, which can control the speed from 0 to 3000SPM for high precision cutting. With comfortable soft grip and ergonomic silicone handle suitable for right and left-handed use
What you get: 1* reciprocating saw, 1* allen key, 2* wood saw blade, 3* metal saw Blade, 1* user manual, 1* warranty card

name: 20V Cordless Reciprocating Saw, 3000 SPM, 22mm Stroke, 2 x 4.0Ah Battery, 8 Saw Blades for Wood, Metal, PVC Cutting
short_description: Advanced Brushless Motor Technology: Featuring a high-performance brushless motor and variable speed trigger, delivering up to 3000 SPM for 30% faster cutting in demanding applications.Enhanced with low noise, smooth operation, extended lifespan, and no sparks.The built-in system efficiently dissipates heat, extending the saw's operational life.

Multi-Material Cutting Capability: Equipped with a 22mm stroke length, this powerful saw can adeptly cut through a variety of materials, including steel bars (max depth 6mm), wood (max depth 150mm), pipes, trees, plastic, and metal.The tool-free blade change mechanism allows for quick and easy adjustments, optimizing the saw for different cutting tasks.

Extended Runtime with Dual Batteries: Comes with 2*4.0Ah Li-Ion batteries and a 2.0A fast charger, providing up to 40-60 minutes of continuous operation.The fast charger fully charges the batteries in just 1 hour, significantly reducing downtime and maximizing productivity.

Ergonomic and Safe Design: Designed with user comfort and safety in mind, featuring a pivoting shoe for better control, an ergonomic handle for a comfortable grip, and a safety lock to prevent accidental starts. The compact, cordless design eliminates the hassle of power cords, making it ideal for various household and professional tasks.

Comprehensive Kit and Lifetime Support: The kit includes a sturdy carrying case, 6 wood saw blades, 2 metal saw blades, and a detailed owner's manual. Backed by friendly customer support, ensuring peace of mind and reliable service.Precautions for Optimal Use: To maintain optimal performance and extend the life of the saw and batteries, allow the tool to cool down after prolonged use.The saw is equipped with automatic overheating protection, temporarily disabling the machine when it reaches high temperatures until it cools sufficiently.Regular breaks during extended use are recommended.

name: 6Amp Reciprocating Saw, 3000SPM Variable Speed Corded Reciprocating Saw with 4/5" Stroke Length, 4-1/2" Max Cutting Depth for Wood, Soft Metal and PVC Pipes Cutting
short_description: Elevated cutting efficiency: Powered by a robust 6.0A motor that unleashes up to 3000SPM. Perfect for tackling substantial logs, wooden fuel supplies, sheet materials, pallets, PVC piping, plastics, cast iron pipes

Optimized for versatility: Featuring a 4/5" stroke length, this reciprocating saw achieves a maximum cutting depth of 4-1/2" in wood. The ergonomic lock on button sustains cutting speed, freeing the finger from constant trigger pressure

Effortless maneuverability: Enjoy seamless blade swaps with the quick change chuck design, eliminating the need for additional tools. The pivoting shoe enhances agility with ±15° tilt, while the adjustable front shoe optimizes blade utilization, prolonging blade life and minimizing waste
Speed control: Equipped with a spacious trigger switch featuring variable speed control (spanning from 0 to 3000 SPM), enabling seamless adaptation to diverse materials and applications
What you will get: 1 * reciprocating saw; 1 * hex key; 3 * wood saw blade; 2 * metal saw Blade; 1 * user manual; 1 * warranty card

name: Makita XRJ05Z 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Brushless Cordless Recipro Saw, Tool Only
short_description: Makita-built variable 2-speed Brushless motor delivers 0-2, 300 (low) & 0-3, 000 (high) strokes per minute and a 1-1/4" Stroke length for faster cutting
"Tool-less" Blade change system allows for faster blade installation and removal for increased productivity
Variable speed trigger for added convenience
Compact and ergonomic design at only 17-1/4" Long
Weighs only 8.2 lbs. With battery (battery not included) for reduced operator fatigue
included components: 6" 6TPI Recipro Saw Blade (723054-A-1) Tool Only (battery and charger not included)
product_description: Makita, a pioneer in Brushless motor technology and battery innovation, combines both in the 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Brushless reciprocating saw (tool only). It has an electronically-controlled BL Brushless motor that matches torque and RPM to the application, and is powered by the industry fastest charging 18V Lithium-Ion batteries (sold separately). with Makita, users can remain in one battery platform, using the same fast-charging 18V batteries on the XRJ05Z As they use across the Makita 18V LXT cordless tool line-up. The XRJ05Z is equipped with efficiency features for faster cutting. The long 1-1/4” stroke length increases cutting efficiency, and the refined crank mechanism design minimizes blade deflection and reduces vibration. Convenience features include an L.E.D. Light to illuminate the line of cut, a retractable tool hook, and "tool-less" Blade Change for faster blade installation and removal.

name: Makita XRJ08Z 18V LXT® Lithium-Ion Brushless Cordless Compact One-Handed Recipro Saw, Tool Only
short_description: Makita-built brushless motor delivers 0 - 3,100 strokes per minute combined with a 7/8” stroke length for faster and more efficient cutting
Up to 55% faster cutting*
Low vibration design; up to 40% less vibration**
One-handed grip is positioned to firmly transmit force to the workpiece while using tool with one hand
Loop-shaped handle guard provides tool rigidity for improved cutting efficiency
product_description: The 18V LXT® Compact One-Handed Recipro Saw (XRJ08Z) is a versatile cutting solution that combines variable speed and low vibration with the convenience of one-handed operation for faster and more efficient cutting.

name: ​​CRAFTSMAN V20 Reciprocating Saw, Cordless, 3,000 RPM, Variable Speed Trigger, Quick Easy Blade Change, Bare Tool Only (CMCS300B)

High performance motor with 1inches Stroke length for speed of completing applications
Full variable speed trigger ranging from 03, 000 RPM's for added control in a variety of materials
Tool-free blade release for quick and easy blade changes

Compatible with the VERSATRACK Wall Organization System. Clip and Accessories sold separately

product_description: This CRAFTSMAN V20 20V max* cordless reciprocating saw has a powerful motor with a 1" Stroke length for speed of application. The variable speed trigger provides optimal control over a variety of materials. The tool-free blade release makes for quick and effortless blade changes. It's compact size of 14.5 in. Fits between studs and allows for cutting in tight places. The contoured overmolded handle and grips make using the product comfortable in all types of orientations.

name: BOSCH RS428 14 Amp Reciprocating Saw
short_description: Power Tools and Accessories
Vibration Control System - Innovative counterbalance technology and anti-vibration handle reduce vibration to a minimum
Best Power to Weight Ratio - Outperforms all major competitors by providing 14 Amps of power and weighing only 8-pounds
product_description: Bosch power tools deliver stronger performance and lasting reliability. The Bosch RS428 reciprocating saw has the highest power to weight ratio of 14 A of power and weighing in at only 8.65 Lbs.. the ergonomic handle provides maximum comfort and a sure grip during cutting. Vibration control which features an innovative counterbalance technology and anti-vibration handle reduce vibration to about 1/3rd that of standard tools. The variable speed trigger -improves cutting control in various materials.

name: DEWALT 20V MAX* Reciprocating Saw, Cordless, 2-Finger Variable Trigger, Keyless Blade Clamp, Tool Only (DCS382B)
short_description: Optimized cutting power and efficiency: get more work done with the stout brushless motor
Speed control and comfort: 2-finger variable trigger design offers ease of use
Fast cuts: rapidly saw through various materials with 1-1/8 in. stroke length
Seamless mobility: compact size designed for a high range of motion
Quick blade changes with twist-style keyless blade clamp
Brighten dark workspaces with on-board LED
Flexible operation: pivoting shoe helps to stabilize the saw against the workpiece throughout the cut
Pro-grade compatibility: works with all DEWALT FLEXVOLT and DEWALT 20V MAX* batteries (sold separately)
product_description: From light construction to demolition, the 20V MAX* Brushless Cordless Reciprocating Saw delivers the cutting power and maneuverability needed for challenging projects. The 1-1/8 in. stroke length and lightweight build offer quick cuts and high productivity. As a part of the expanding 20V MAX* lineup, this tool is compatible with all 20V MAX* batteries and chargers.
